about_the_game:
Story

Stellar Dream puts you in the middle of sci-fi adventure where your choices shape your destiny and the fate of humanity. The colony ship was set out to find new worlds for human colonization and their scouts left to the three most suitable candidates, but the communication with them has been lost. Your task is to bring the scouts home, find a suitable home for the colony and establish diplomatic ties with alien life forms.



Explore three distinct planets

Every planet available for exploration has its unique nature and humanoid aliens. Will you be able to survive in this unfamiliar environment and succeed in your mission?



Meaningful relationships




It is up to you of how to approach multiple situations and what kind of character you want to be. Will you be loved? Hated? Will you make allies, find love, make your harem or corrupt others to your desires? This is all up to you!



Improve your character



With 5 attributes to focus and improve upon, you can create a character that is suited for your playstyle the most and use your skills in dialogues, combat or intimacy.





Quests and inventory system




Help others with their problems and earn valuable rewards. Invest your money into buying powerful weapons and defeat your enemies.





Impregnation and pregnancy



Secure your future with one or more women abord the ship or even some aliens.



Features:

Over 100 sex scenes.
Romance or corrupt over 15 characters!
Explore alien worlds and its habitants.
Decide what kind of hero you want to be.

content_descriptors.notes:
The adult content in this game includes but is not limited to:

-Sexual encounters with various characters

-Impregnation and pregnancy

-Full female and male nudity

-Group sex

-BDSM

-Strong language and swearing

-Use of alcohol and references to drugs

-Violence

-Murder

Characters in this fictional story may express beliefs or carry out actions that could be considered offensive to some.

All sexually involved characters are over the age of 18.

detailed_description:
Story

Stellar Dream puts you in the middle of sci-fi adventure where your choices shape your destiny and the fate of humanity. The colony ship was set out to find new worlds for human colonization and their scouts left to the three most suitable candidates, but the communication with them has been lost. Your task is to bring the scouts home, find a suitable home for the colony and establish diplomatic ties with alien life forms.



Explore three distinct planets

Every planet available for exploration has its unique nature and humanoid aliens. Will you be able to survive in this unfamiliar environment and succeed in your mission?



Meaningful relationships




It is up to you of how to approach multiple situations and what kind of character you want to be. Will you be loved? Hated? Will you make allies, find love, make your harem or corrupt others to your desires? This is all up to you!



Improve your character



With 5 attributes to focus and improve upon, you can create a character that is suited for your playstyle the most and use your skills in dialogues, combat or intimacy.





Quests and inventory system




Help others with their problems and earn valuable rewards. Invest your money into buying powerful weapons and defeat your enemies.





Impregnation and pregnancy



Secure your future with one or more women abord the ship or even some aliens.



Features:

Romance or corrupt over 15 characters!
Explore alien worlds and its habitants.
Decide what kind of hero you want to be.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: Stellar Dream

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Embark on a journey to find a new home for humanity. Forge relationships with women aboard the ship and aliens on exotic planets in this Adults-Only Visual Novel.
